name: Citi® / AAdvantage® Executive World Elite Mastercard®
freak_verdict: 9/10. For the American Airlines loyalist, this card is nearly impossible to beat. The $595 annual fee is steep, but it includes an Admirals Club membership valued at $850. With the addition of $360 in total annual credits for Grubhub, Lyft, and Avis/Budget, the effective annual fee can actually be negative if you maximize the perks. The 70k signup bonus and 4x earning rate on AA flights make it a powerhouse for status seekers.
